question:
You are due to start a new job next week but you will not be able to because you have some problems.
Write a letter to your new employer. In your letter:

explain your situation
describe your problems
tell him/her when you think you can start
text: I, Kuljeet Kaur, writing this letter to you to express my regret to join my duty at the prescribed time.

I want to  inform you that I got appointed in this firm  for the post of an Accountant and asked to join the duty by coming Monday on the 28th of August. I was very keen to start my new work, however, I am unable to join. Unfortunately, I met with an accident yesterday due to which I got a serious injury in my right leg.

Physicians suggested complete bed rest for me for a while because I got a fracture in my leg.Thus, due to the above-mentioned reason, I am unable to start my new job by the prescribed time. Therefore,  it would be really commendable  if you could please allow my absence from the 28th of August.
I will definitely start my duty after 10 days i.e on the 8th of September. This will be really helpful for me if you could permit me to do that.
Looking forward to hearing a positive reply from your side.
